metadata.title: CVE-2024-26753 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: crypto:virtio/akcipher - Fix stack overflow on memcpy sizeof(structvirtio_crypto_akcipher_session_para) is less than sizeof(structvirtio_crypto_op_ctrl_req::u), copying more bytes from stack variable leadsstack overflow. Clang reports this issue by commands: make -j CC=clang-14mrproper >/dev/null 2>&1 make -j O=/tmp/crypto-build CC=clang-14allmodconfig >/dev/null 2>&1 make -j O=/tmp/crypto-build W=1 CC=clang-14drivers/crypto/virtio/ virtio_crypto_akcipher_algs.o

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
